solution: Subtracting $\frac12$ from both sides gives $\frac1x = \frac56-\frac12 = \frac13$, so taking the reciprocal of both sides gives $x = \boxed{3}$.
chatgpt_solution: Subtracting $\frac12$ from both sides of the equation, we have $\dfrac{1}{x} = \dfrac{5}{6} - \dfrac{1}{2} = \dfrac{5}{6} - \dfrac{3}{6} = \dfrac{2}{6}$. Since $\frac{1}{6}\cdot6 = 1$, we have $6\cdot \frac{1}{6} = 6\cdot1$.  So $\frac{6}{6} = 6$, and $\frac16\cdot 6 = 1\cdot 6$, which implies $x = \boxed{6}$.
